root: ^So what is it that you want?
^Good morning sir. I have a few questions about the events of last night
^Hi I have a few questions, about last night. Can you answer them?
^Straighten up scum !!! You look like a sorry excuse for a human being !

c-0: ^Yeah ? And I don't feel like answering them copper.
c-1: ^Nah. I don't feel like answering them copper.
c-2: ^Fuck you copper! Wonder how you would look if you have been drinking all night!

1a: ^We can do this here or at the precinct. It is all the same to me. But you will lose a good few hours.
^Look man, I had a long wait for that bozo over there. Do me a solid and answer the questions?

g-0: ^Okay man. I was just kiddinging. What do you want to know.
^Ok that's enough. I'm taking you in for obstruction.

2nd: ^I'm sorry sir. I don't know what came over me.
^Look dude I'm sorry ok? Sometimes I feel like something else is controlling me. Making me do all those things...
^Fuck you too! I'm taking you in for assault on an officer!

c-0: ^You really should be careful with a mouth like that.
c-1: ^Yeah I get that. Sometimes i get this feeling too when I'm on a bender.

3rd: ^Where were you at 12.00 pm last night?
^What is your relation to the victim?
^Can anyone confirm that? Any friends you went out with?
^You murdered him didn't you? I know you did.
^Okay We are done here. Please do not leave the building until we are done with the crime scene.

c-0: ^I was out. Drinking ... heavily ... Man my head hurts.
^Did you try Alka-Seltzer? I hear it works wonders... Oh and what bar did you go to?
^It is your own fault. Now answer the question. WHERE were you drinking?
^I am sorry you are in pain but this is police business. Where were you drinking?
^Tried that but it doesn't work on a hangover like mine. I was at Kristoff's all night. Lucien, the bartender can confirm.
c-1: ^You are really testing me here. A bar. Kristoff's.
^Barely knew the guy. Sometime our mail got mixed up and I had to get it from him. Seemed a good enough chap.
^Anything you can tell me about him?
^Sir this is a murder investigation. I would appreciate you being a little more forthcoming.

c-0: ^Nothing to tell. He kept to himself. I think he used to date that broad over there. She might tell you more.
^Hard to tell. I think she was being a bit jealous. They argued a lot. (first clue)
c-1: ^Yeah I would expect that. They were fighting a lot and she doesn't want to be considered a suspect. She actually hit him once in the hallway. (first clue)
^Okay I didn't want to say bad thing about a dead guy but he was a bit of an odd sort. Sometimes strange people came and went.
^Okay you are just making stuff up.
^Strange people like what? The mafia? Illuminati? Give me something to work with here.

c-0: ^The kind that you don't look at too much. Gangsters I think.
c-2: ^The kind that you don't look at too much. Gangsters I think.
^Hell if I know. We are not friends or nothing like that. But he works nights. You will find him there.
c-3: ^No, I was alone. But the bartender can confirm. His name is Lucien.
c-4: ^Fuck you man. This conversation is over. You want to accuse me of anything you can do it at the station. I didn't touch the guy.
^Okay, maybe I was a bit rash. Sorry.
^ I think you did. I'm taking you in.

c-0: ^Well maybe you should learn to keep that big mouth shut.

army: ^I don't need an army to take you down. Ever heard of tasers?
^On second thought I think I changed my mind.

s: ^Make my day. Punk. I fucking dare you...
^You have a choice here. Make a good one...

army: ^It doesn't have to come to that. Just answer the questions.
^Look be cool man and answer the damn questions

c-0: ^"Flexes his muscles." Wanna go? Think you are quick enough?
c-4: ^Well I don't feel like it. Wanna grab me for something I didn't do you can go ahead.

goneDown: ^You have the right to remain slient. Anything you say can and will be used against you in the court of law..
^Ups. Gonna have to explain that now.

g-0: ^He is not getting up anytime soon.

Intimidation: ^Okay. Damn you copper. I had an argument with him last night. We fought. It was an accident.

s: ^You have the right to remain slient. Anything you say can and will be used against you in the court of law..

c-1: ^You have the right to remain slient. Anything you say can and will be used against you in the court of law..

angry: ^You do not get to lecture me motherfucker. Start answering questions or I push your face in.

g-0: ^We are done here. Get the fuck out of my face.

falseArrest: ^On second thought I think I changed my mind.

c-1: ^He stares at you as if looks could kill.
^You have the right to remain slient. Anything you say can and will be used against you in the court of law..

c-0: ^(block the punch and hit him back)
^(move out of the way and kick him. Hard.)
^(move out of the way and shoot him with a taser.)
